title: YouTube TV bringing picture-in-picture to its iOS app, wider surround sound support coming too
content:
Google’s YouTube TV service, despite its high price, is one of the best ways to keep live channels without traditional cable. Now, in an interview, a YouTube TV exec has confirmed that picture-in-picture support is coming to iOS and surround sound will see expanded support too.

more…

The post YouTube TV bringing picture-in-picture to its iOS app, wider surround sound support coming too appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: YouTube TV will be bringing support for picture-in-picture viewing to its iOS app in the "next few months" after long offering it on Android.
